CustomField.formula: IF ( DMAPP__Opportunity__r.IsClosed == false && DMAPP__Qualification_Projected__c > 0, DMAPP__Opportunity_Amount__c + IF(DMAPP__Opportunity__r.IsWon, DMAPP__Opportunity_Amount__c, 0), 0 + IF(DMAPP__Opportunity__r.IsWon, DMAPP__Opportunity_Amount__c, 0))
CustomField.label: Forecast Closed Projected Amount
